items.sentence: Tom doesn't know where he was born, but his mother told me that he was born in Boston.
Is it wrong to buy things made by companies that don't have decent working conditions?
Tom only found out after his mother's death that she had gambled away his inheritance.
Tom called Mary over to ask her what she thought of the tie he was thinking of buying.
Sometimes I wonder when the first world championship in cyberbullying will take place.
